topic: 1. Appointment of New RBI Deputy Governor – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: RBI appoints new Deputy Governor in July
subtopics.content: • Reserve Bank of India appointed Dr. Anil Kumar as Deputy Governor in July 2025.

topic: 2. Appointment of New SEBI Chief – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: SEBI gets new Chairperson in July
subtopics.content: • Ms. Priya Mehra was appointed as Chairperson of SEBI in July 2025.

topic: 3. World Bank Excellence Award to India – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: India wins World Bank Excellence Award
subtopics.content: • India received the World Bank Excellence Award for Digital Governance in July 2025.
• Kerala was awarded the UNESCO Literacy Award for outstanding literacy programs in July 2025.

topic: 5. Best Public Sector Bank Award – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: SBI gets Best Public Sector Bank Award
subtopics.content: • State Bank of India received the Best Public Sector Bank Award at the Banking Excellence Awards in July 2025.

topic: 6. International Olympiad Gold for India – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: India wins gold in International Physics Olympiad
subtopics.content: • Indian student team secured gold medal in the International Physics Olympiad held in July 2025.

topic: 7. Asian Development Bank Innovation Award – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: ADB honors India with Innovation Award
subtopics.content: • India won the ADB Innovation Award for financial inclusion projects in July 2025.

topic: 8. International Chess Champion from India – July 2025

subtopics.content: • Arjun Erigaisi won the International Chess Championship in July 2025.

subtopics.subtopic: Rani Rampal gets Major Dhyan Chand Khel Ratna
subtopics.content: • Hockey player Rani Rampal was honored with the Khel Ratna Award in July 2025.

subtopics.subtopic: India wins UN Public Service Award
subtopics.content: • Government of India received the UN Public Service Award for its digital health initiative in July 2025.

subtopics.subtopic: Indian teacher wins Global Teacher Prize
subtopics.content: • Ms. Sunita Sharma won the $1 million Global Teacher Prize in July 2025.

topic: 12. Excellence in Rural Development Award – July 2025

subtopics.subtopic: Odisha gets award for rural development
subtopics.content: • Odisha bagged the Excellence in Rural Development Award in July 2025.

subtopics.subtopic: Fintech startup wins Best Startup Award
subtopics.content: • PayLink India was declared Best Startup of the Year in July 2025.
• The Indian short film 'Silent Shores' won the Best Short Film award at Cannes 2025.

subtopics.subtopic: India honored for green energy projects
subtopics.content: • India received the Green Energy Excellence Award from IRENA in July 2025.

subtopics.subtopic: ISRO chief gets International Space Award
subtopics.content: • ISRO Chairman Dr. S. Unnikrishnan Nair received the International Space Science Award in July 2025.

subtopics.subtopic: Indian NGO wins Global Peace Award
subtopics.content: • The NGO 'Peace for All' from India won the Global Peace Award in July 2025.
• Dr. Rakesh Malhotra received the National Science Award for quantum computing research in July 2025.

subtopics.subtopic: Rajasthan wins Asia’s Best Destination Award
subtopics.content: • Rajasthan was named Asia’s Best Tourism Destination in July 2025.

topic: 20. Indian Author Wins Booker Prize – July 2025

subtopics.content: • Author Meera Nair won the Booker Prize 2025 for her novel 'The Last Monsoon'.
• India received the WHO Health Innovation Award for AI-based disease detection in July 2025.
• India was honored for its large-scale tree plantation program in July 2025.

subtopics.subtopic: Tata Group wins Global Business Leader Award
subtopics.content: • Tata Group was named Global Business Leader at the World Business Awards in July 2025.
• The Athletics Federation of India won the International Sports Federation Excellence Award in July 2025.

subtopics.subtopic: IIT Delhi named Asia’s Best University
subtopics.content: • IIT Delhi topped the Asia University Rankings in July 2025.

subtopics.subtopic: Indian NGO honored for women empowerment
subtopics.content: • NGO 'Shakti' received the UN Women’s Empowerment Award in July 2025.
• Architect Rohan Verma won the International Architecture Excellence Award in July 2025.

subtopics.subtopic: Indian student wins Young Scientist Award
subtopics.content: • Ananya Gupta received the Young Scientist Award for renewable energy research in July 2025.

• India was recognized with the Global Climate Action Award for renewable energy expansion in July 2025.

subtopics.content: • Justice Raghav Menon received the International Law Prize for contributions to environmental law in July 2025.

subtopics.subtopic: Delhi Airport wins top Asia award

• NTPC Limited received the Best Public Sector Undertaking Award in July 2025.

• Federation of Indian Export Organisations (FIEO) won the Global Trade Leadership Award in July 2025.

subtopics.subtopic: HDFC Bank named Asia’s Best Bank

subtopics.content: • Bengaluru won Asia’s Best Startup Ecosystem Award in July 2025.
